projects.title: HackaMotiVE | Prof. S. Sankar Ganesh | VIT, Vellore
projects.description: HackaMotiVE is hackathon website conducted by Elektrobit (EB) and VIT Vellore, the website gives us an easy way to manage applications, view registration stats, and more.

projects.title: Code-It-Out | Udemy | React and TypeScript
projects.description: It is an interactive browser-based coding environment. It's like a Jupyter Notebook, but for Javascript, with many additional features added in. Yes, this is what you are going to build in this course! You will solve incredible challenges around bundling and transpiling code directly in the browser. This is a task normally done by running Webpack and Babel at your terminal! You can execute user's code safely in the browser.

projects.title: Library-App
projects.description: It is a desktop application made using tkinter in python which allows you tostore details of all the books you want and can access at any point in time.

projects.title: CRUD-APP
projects.description: It is an interactive Shopping App. Where users can buy and sell their own products.
